name: Grass Is No More (itch)
description:
Don't you hate spring? Try to progress trough levels by gathering points by mowing grass. Build up combos and try to avoid those nasty molehills and RC cars. Use power-ups to gather even more points. Double your points in minigames and become the best lawn mower driver in the world.

Share your score and gameplay info on social media sites*.

-Fun and action packed game sessions

-Infinite number of randomly generated levels

-Rockets attached to lawn mowers!

-Online score database

-Mini games

-Power-ups

-Combos

*Internet connection is required

**If you get the full version you'll get a Desura key
